com.joelhockey.codec
Class TLV

java.lang.Object
  com.joelhockey.codec.TLV

public class TLV
extends java.lang.Object

Tag-Length-Value (TLV). Handles BER and DER encoding.

Author:
Joel Hockey

TLV

public TLV(int cc,
           int t,
           java.util.List<TLV> parts,
           boolean indefinite)
Create TLV from Tag and constructed parts. Supports indefinite length encoding. If indefinite, but last part is not EOC, EOC is added.

Parameters:
cc - class and constructed bits
t - tag
parts - constructed parts
indefinite - if true, use indefinite length encoding

parse_l

public static int[] parse_l(java.io.InputStream ins)
                     throws java.io.IOException
A stream based length reader. Returns -1 for indefinite length

Parameters:
ins - input stream to read from
Returns:
int array [length, number-bytes-read]. Will return length -1 for indefinite-length

java.io.IOException - if error reading from stream
